patterns: How much is the tuition fee
responses:
What school specifically are you pertaining to?
Schools in SLU:
School of Nursing (SON)
School of Engineering and Architecture (SEA)
School of Natural Sciences (SNS)
School of Medicine (SOM)
School of Accountancy, Management, Computing and Information Studies (SAMCIS)
School of Teacher Education and Liberal Arts (STELA)
School of Law (SOL)

patterns: what is the tuition fee for School of Nursing?
responses: Bachelor of Science in Nursing: ₱37,000 - ₱41,000

patterns: Is there an entrance exam for new applicants in SLU?
responses: SLU College Entrance Examination For Incoming Freshmen for more information go to https://www.slu.edu.ph/admissionfreshmen-application-guidelines/

patterns: What if I failed to the SLU Entrance Examination, could I retake it?
responses: Unfortunately, No

patterns: What are the requirements for new applicants in SLU?
responses: Click the link for more information https://www.slu.edu.ph/admission/freshmen-application-guidelines/ and fill up the form here: https://i2.slu.edu.ph/newapplication/apply.jsp

patterns: What are the requirements for existing students in SLU?
What are the Requirements for Old Student who will enroll?
responses: Go to your slu portal then click the (Enrollment) on the navigation bar. There are steps and instructions there that you need to follow for your enrollment.

patterns: How will we pay for the tuition?
What is the mode of payment?
responses: Are you currently enrolled in SLU?
Login to your portal then go to statement of accounts then look for dragonpay or apply for an installment using bukas

patterns: No, I am not yet enrolled.
responses: You must first apply for an enrollment in SLU and pass the entrance exam. You can do this by visiting this website, https://i2.slu.edu.ph/newapplication/. Fill in the enrollment form and wait for you scheduled visit at the Main Campus, Bonificatio Street, Baguio City.
